metadata.description: One is a super-hero, the other a super-villain, and the third doesn't know which side she's on! Revisiting their rivalry from this summer's smash 1-Shot hit, Bomb Queen and Blacklight go at it again, this time on Bomb Queen's turf! Joining Blacklight is ShadowHawk's own Rebound - but why do they want in to New Port City, and more importantly - will they be able to get out?
metadata.name: Bomb Queen III
